about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Web Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in high-performance frontend architectures, full-stack AI integrations, and scalable e-commerce solutions using React and Node.js.

responsibilities: Architected a reusable React component library for internal configuration management, accelerating UI migration and developer velocity across the organization.
Engineered a full-stack AI assistant for Booking Holdings using LLMs, enabling seamless natural language interactions within core platform user interfaces.
Spearheaded productionalization of a hackathon-winning restaurant management tool, securing a high-priority placement on the 2026 strategic product roadmap.
Optimized critical payment capture and onboarding flows, achieving high-reliability E2E coverage for global restaurant verification and processing.
Orchestrated cross-platform technical upgrades for Node/React and implemented self-serve internal tools for payment processor integrations to reduce manual overhead.
Led frontend development for Uniqlo's global e-commerce platform using React.JS and GraphQL, ensuring high performance for over 60M active users.
Optimized a complex BFF application via Node.js and Express, streamlining communication with 20+ microservices for enhanced system scalability.
Architected a robust country configuration system, enabling seamless global scaling and localization across multiple international regions and sub-brands.
Implemented Google Wallet with 3DS support across 26 countries, driving a 10% boost in conversion rates by streamlining payment checkout flows.
Utilized Firebase Remote Config for A/B testing on cart recommendations, significantly improving CTA engagement and successfully productionalizing winning variants.
Built a high-performance PWA Email Newsletter Builder from scratch using React and PostgreSQL, empowering marketing teams with drag-and-drop template creation.
Developed a viral referral feature for Uniqlo US/Japan, contributing to a substantial customer base growth of 0.8 million users.
Engineered a React/GraphQL Proof of Concept to document API calls and error cases between SPA and microservices for improved clarity.
Mentored junior engineers on modern frontend practices and Uniqlo's platform architecture to ensure consistent knowledge sharing and onboarding.

projects.name: Wizard's Chess (PWA)
projects.description: A high-performance multiplayer 3D chess environment with real-time social features.
details: Implemented immersive 3D rendering and game state management using React Three Fiber and Three.js.
Integrated peer-to-peer video communication using WebRTC and Firebase for real-time multiplayer engagement.
